title: Coronation Street: Tracy Barlow 'set for a steamy romp with Sophie Webster's ex Paula'
text:
She's been somewhat happily married to Steve McDonald since last year.

But in a shock Coronation Street twist, Tracy Barlow will reportedly enjoy a steamy romp with Sophie Webster's ex-girlfriend Paula Martin next year.

A source told The Sun that Tracy will have a one-night stand with lesbian Paula, and after her daughter Amy finds out she bribes the lawyer to keep her quiet.

Naughty: Coronation Street maneater Tracy Barlow is reportedly set to enjoy a steamy romp with Sophie Webster's ex-girlfriend Paula in scenes set to air next year

The source said: 'Her and Paula will end up spending the night together after one thing leads to another.

'Amy then tries to bribe Paula into staying silent to mixed results.

'It’s not known if Steve finds out, but when Amy gets wind of it she does her utmost to try and keep it a secret and bribe Paula into staying quiet.'

Drama: Lawyer Paula has been single and is set for a steamy one-night stand with Tracy, but both quickly regret the liason

Scheming: Tracy's daughter Amy soon finds out and she tries to bribe Paula to keep quiet about her mum's infidelity

The publication then reports that Leanne Battersby (played by Jane Danson) - who has a child with Steve following a one-night stand - will learn about the liaison after she hears Tracy (Kate Ford) and Paula (Stirling Gallacher) arguing.

She quickly confronts the pair, and Paula insists that the evening was strictly a one-off and it won't happen again.

MailOnline has contacted representatives for Coronation Street for comment.

Tracy has long been known as one of Corrie's most notorious man-eaters, including her love-hate relationship with Steve (Simon Gregson).

After marrying in 2012, the couple split just hours later when it was revealed she lied about Becky McDonald (Katherine Kelly) being responsible for the miscarriage of her twins.

Together: Despite their turbulent relationship, Tracy is still married to Steve McDonald, after they tied the knot last year for the second time

But the couple stunned fans when they reignited their relationship in Christmas 2017, and they went onto tie the knot for the second time last year.

She also briefly rekindled her relationship with ex-husband Robert Preston, but they eventually split and he moved on with Michelle Connor.

Paula first joined Corrie last year to represent Sally Metcalfe after she was wrongfully imprisoned, and went onto have a romance with her daughter Sophie.

The couple split when Sophie left Weatherfield to go travelling earlier this month, to coincide to actress Brooke Vincent's maternity leave.
